#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--){
    long long int n,num,max=0;
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
      scanf("%lld",&num);

      if(num%9==0 && num!=0){
        num=9;
        if(num>max)
          max=num;
      }
      else{
          num=num%9;
          if(num>max)
          max=num;
    }
    }
    switch(max){
    case 0:printf("red\n");
           break;
    case 1:printf("blue\n");
           break;
    case 2:printf("pink\n");
           break;
    case 3:printf("white\n");
           break;
    case 4:printf("black\n");
           break;
    case 5:printf("violet\n");
           break;
    case 6:printf("cyan\n");
           break;
    case 7:printf("yellow\n");
           break;
    case 8:printf("green\n");
           break;
    case 9:printf("brown\n");
           break;
    }

    }

    return 0;
}
